alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 7:05PM CDT until June 30 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rooks County in north central Kansas... Southern Phillips County in north central Kansas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 703 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bogue, or 7 miles east of Hill City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Damar around 710 PM CDT. Webster State Park around 720 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Stockton and Woodston. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
